last_episode_to_air.name: Avery Starts Driving
last_episode_to_air.overview: After running over a neighbor's lawn gnome, Avery asks Tyler to help her prep for her driving test. Meanwhile, Chloe's afraid that getting older will jeopardize her title as "the cute one."

name: Dog with a Blog
overview: Avery Jennings and Tyler James are step-siblings who are complete opposites. The family faces an even bigger adjustment when their new dog, Stan, can talk and also has a blog, unbeknownst to the family. Stan uses his blog to discuss the happenings in the Jennings-James household. Avery and Tyler later learn of Stan's talking ability and agree to keep it a secret from their parents.

episodes.name: Stan of the House
episodes.overview: When Tyler and Avery are given a dog that talks, they agree on one thing: Stan's ability to speak must be kept a secret from everyone, even their parents.

episodes.name: The Fast and the Furriest
episodes.overview: After Tyler gets his learner's permit, he wants to drive alone due to his parents annoying him, and everyone wanting taking advantage of him. Chaos ensues when Stan crashes the car because he wanted to be like a person, and everyone thinks Tyler did it. Meanwhile, Ellen and Bennett relive the memories they shared with Tyler and Avery when they were kids and realize that they are all grown-up, so they start cherishing memories with Chloe. In flashbacks, it is revealed that Ellen and Bennett had an ugly run-in at the park when Avery and Tyler were much younger, however they do not remember this.

episodes.name: Dog with a Hog
episodes.overview: Avery and her best friend, Lindsay (Kayla Maisonet), are in desperate need for a replacement to be the school mascot to perform at the homecoming game. Stan convinces Avery to let him be the school mascot, but she is worried because the rival team always pulls horrible pranks on the mascots. Meanwhile, Ellen is beyond annoyed because the car always smells horribly bad, so she persuades Bennett into buying a new car.

episodes.name: WingStan
episodes.overview: After Tyler develops a crush on their new neighbor, Nikki Ortiz (Denyse Tontz), he invites her to walk their dogs together. Tyler enlists Stan to be his wing-man, and to Stan's dismay, he cannot stand Nikki's Pomeranian, Evita, due to her incessant barking. Meanwhile, Chloe asks Bennett to speak at Career Day about his job, but Bennett is shocked when Chloe believes he is a sock-ologist, a person who studies socks, instead of a psychologist.

episodes.name: World of Woofcraft
episodes.overview: Stan has been addicted to a game called Realm of the Tower, where he has made a new friend Kilgor (Kevin). When the game-players are gathering at the park, Stan asks Avery to pretend to be him so they can go and meet his gaming companions. Meanwhile, Chloe has been begging to get her ears pierced, but Ellen and Bennett refuse to take her, so she tricks Tyler into taking her much to Ellen's dismay.

episodes.name: Bark! the Herald Angels Sing
episodes.overview: It is the family's first Christmas together and Avery is prepping Tyler, Chloe, and Stan because Ellen has a reputation of giving horrible gifts. Meanwhile, Bennett and Ellen argue over whose Christmas traditions to follow.

episodes.name: The Parrot Trap
episodes.overview: Ellen has decided to get a pet of her own, a talking parrot, but the rest of the family is not very comfortable with it.

episodes.name: The Bone Identity
episodes.overview: After overhearing Avery talk about Stan's secret, Karl Fink (the family's neighbor) starts spying on Stan and the rest of the family to find out his secret. To make sure he doesn't find out, Avery decides to enter Tyler into a math competition against Karl after it is revealed Tyler is a math genius. The plan to divert Karl from Stan's actual secret works, and he eventually believes that there was no secret and that Avery tried to get back at him for a prank he pulled earlier. Meanwhile, Bennett tries to get Chloe to stop wearing her magician's outfit to school.

episodes.name: Stan Stops Talking
episodes.overview: Avery, Tyler, & Chloe discover that Stan isn't talking, so they must figure out why without their parents discovering the secret.

episodes.name: Dog Loses Girl
episodes.overview: When Stan is in charge of watching Chloe, she goes missing!

episodes.name: Stan-ing Guard
episodes.overview: The family trains Stan to be a guard dog.

episodes.name: Freaky Fido
episodes.overview: When Avery realizes that her family thinks that she is not fun, she decides to prove them wrong by making a movie with her family called "Freaky Fido".

episodes.name: Guess Who's a Cheerleader
episodes.overview: Avery makes the cheerleading squad

episodes.name: Crimes of the Art
episodes.overview: Tyler enters the same art competition as Avery.

episodes.name: Avery's First Crush
episodes.overview: Avery has a huge crush on a boy named Dustin Pitt, and in order to spend time with him she enlists the help of Tyler, who in turn wants her to help him spend time with Nikki. Avery and Dustin end up watching a movie together and later with Stan's help, Avery tells Dustin she likes him. Dustin likes her back and asks her out. Meanwhile, Chloe and Stan play chess (Chloe's version of chess) while Tyler has a mustache glued to his face.

episodes.name: The Truck Stops Here
episodes.overview: Tyler gets a summer job on a food truck and decides he would rather have his own truck than finish school.

episodes.name: Avery's First Breakup
episodes.overview: Avery's boyfriend (Dustin) dumps her and Stan tells her that she should go to her mother for help. Tyler accidentally crashes the food truck when he took out the brick that holds it.

episodes.name: A New Baby?
episodes.overview: Avery, Tyler and Chloe react to the news, when Stan overhears a conversation between Ellen and Bennett about a possible new addition to the family. Bennett has the chance to become a public speaker and be rich, but the children ruin it all thinking they will have a new baby.

episodes.name: Stan Talks to Gran
episodes.overview: After Grandma hears Stan talking while babysitting the children, she begins to think that she is going crazy, prompting the children to decide whether or not they should share Stan’s secret with Grandma.

episodes.name: Avery's Wild Party
episodes.overview: To help land an internship with a City Official, Avery agrees to a throw party at her house for the official’s demanding daughter, while keeping it a secret from her parents. Meanwhile, Bennett and Ellen attend a sleepover at the park with Chloe and her Healthy Muffins Troop.

episodes.name: My Parents Posted What?!
episodes.overview: Bennett and Ellen discover Avery's secret online 'Buddy Bop' account. When they try to shut Avery's account down, they accidentally post an embarrassing video. Meanwhile, Stan must face his past and do the tango with Chloe, to win an animal talent show. In the end, Stan loses the talent show to a talking dog.

episodes.name: Stan's Old Owner
episodes.overview: Stan's former owner, Ian, arrives from Spokane, Washington, to reclaim Stan. He tells Stan he found his original family and they can all talk too. So Stan has to choose between his old family and his new family.

episodes.name: Too Short
episodes.overview: On the first day of school, Avery feels insecure when noticing her classmates' growth spurts over the summer; Tyler reveals a new haircut.

episodes.name: Good Girl Gone Bad
episodes.overview: Avery arrives at school and learns that she's been left out of "ditch day."

episodes.name: Howloween
episodes.overview: Avery refuses to help the family with their annual haunted house.

episodes.name: Stan Makes His Mark
episodes.overview: Stan makes a video about being the world’s first talking dog to leave as his legacy, but the parents grow suspicious of what’s on the tape, so the kids must record over it. Meanwhile, Ellen decides to take a job with Stan’s veterinarian, but soon learns she may not be well suited for it.

episodes.name: Tyler Gets a Grillfriend
episodes.overview: Tyler works with Emily in the food truck and they hit it off.

episodes.name: Don't Karl Us, We'll Karl You
episodes.overview: After Tyler, Avery, and Chloe have to hang out with their annoying neighbor, Karl, they quickly come up with a plan to keep him away.

episodes.name: Twas the Fight Before Christmas
episodes.overview: When Ellen's self-obsessed sister comes over, due to a flight delay to Hawaii, Avery tries to help her mom to get through the visit. Meanwhile Stan, Tyler, and Chloe attempt to hide a stray dog named Sparky in the house for Christmas.

episodes.name: Lost in Stanslation
episodes.overview: When Avery agrees to tutor Wes in Spanish so she can hang out with him, she needs to learn Spanish herself, first. So she enlists Nikki to tell her what to say through an earpiece that she'll be wearing, but when Nikki and Tyler start arguing, Avery's still repeating everything they say.

episodes.name: Avery B. Jealous
episodes.overview: After Avery blows her chance with Wes, she finds out he asks Lindsay on a date instead. Avery and Lindsay get in a big fight and decide to compete for Wes. Wes finds out about Avery's feelings and how she has a crush on him.

episodes.name: Love Ty-Angle
episodes.overview: After Tyler's friendship with Nikki begins to interfere with his relationship with his girlfriend Emily, he has to make an tough choice between the two.

episodes.name: Stan Runs Away
episodes.overview: The constant fighting between the kids leads Stan to run away

episodes.name: I Want My Nikki Back, Nikki Back, Nikki Back
episodes.overview: When Tyler decides to try and get Nikki back as his girlfriend, Avery is hesitant to help him for fear of being caught between her friend and brother, but ultimately intervenes.

episodes.name: Avery-body Dance Now
episodes.overview: Avery is excited to attend the school dance with Wes and secretly seeks dance lessons from her neighbor, Karl. However, things do not turn out as planned when Wes becomes suspicious of Avery spending so much time with Karl.

episodes.name: The Green-Eyed Monster
episodes.overview: Stan unintentionally gets Avery and Wes to break up and try to get them back together.

episodes.name: Who's Training Who?
episodes.overview: When Stan acts up, Ellen hires strict animal instructor Cherri Pickford to help train him. When Stan does not comply, Ellen goes against the kids' wishes and demands he stay outside.

episodes.name: Love, Loss and a Beanbag Toss
episodes.overview: Avery doesn't understand why Wes is keeping his distance, but ultimately learns he is nervous to tell her that he is moving away.

episodes.name: How I Met Your Brother and Sister
episodes.overview: Avery, Tyler and Chloe try to plan something special for their parents' upcoming anniversary.

episodes.name: Will Sing for Food Truck
episodes.overview: Tyler makes a commercial for his boss' food truck business.

episodes.name: Stuck in the Mini with You
episodes.overview: Avery and Ellen go on a mother/daughter trip and leaves Bennett in charge of getting Chloe ready for her dance recital.

episodes.name: Pod People from Pasadena
episodes.overview: Avery learns she's been selected to create a float for her town's parade and is excited to spend some quality time with her father to build it. Meanwhile, Chloe watches a sci-fi movie that leads her to believe her family is being taken over by aliens and that the parede float they are costructing is really a spaceship

episodes.name: The Mutt and the Mogul
episodes.overview: Wealthy business tycoon Tom Fairbanks wants to buy Stan from the James-Jennings family to use him as a spokes-dog for his animal rescue campaign. Fearful that Bennett and Ellen might say yes, Avery, Tyler and Chloe hire actors to play their parents and turn down the offer before they are approached.

episodes.name: Stan Gets Schooled
episodes.overview: Stan uses a computerized robot to go to school with Avery and Tyler where he feels pressured into deciding if he should join Avery or Tyler’s social circle.

episodes.name: Karl Finds Out Stan's Secret
episodes.overview: Karl, the James-Jennings’ family neighbor, reveals to the kids that he knows Stan’s secret.

episodes.name: The Kids Find Out Stan Blogs
episodes.overview: Stan's blog is accidentally submitted as Bennett's latest book and the kids must work together to protect Stan's secret.

episodes.name: Guess Who Gets Expelled?
episodes.overview: On Avery's first day of high school, Tyler ropes her into his senior prank that ultimately gets them both expelled.

episodes.name: Howloween 2: The Final Reckoning
episodes.overview: When Ellen and Bennett overhear Stan talking, the kids go to great lengths to convince their parents the house is haunted to help keep Stan's secret.

episodes.name: Avery Schools Tyler
episodes.overview: When Tyler is invited to join a professional freestyle BMX team, he enlists Avery as a tutor to try and help him graduate early.

episodes.name: Stan Falls in Love
episodes.overview: Stan has a crush on the new neighborhood dog, Princess, but he has to figure out how to get past her owner, who is a pretentious schoolmate of Avery's.

episodes.name: Avery vs. Teacher
episodes.overview: Though Avery 's assignments are perfectly executed, she misses the true point in her life skills class and receives a disappointing grade.

episodes.name: Stan Steals Christmas
episodes.overview: In an effort to teach the James-Jennings kids the true meaning behind Christmas, Stan hides all of the holiday presents from the family, ultimately teaching them a greater lesson about giving back to others.

episodes.name: Avery Makes Over Max
episodes.overview: Avery's feelings are hurt when she realizes Max doesn't like her designs. Meanwhile, Stan gets a makeover to impress his new girlfriend.

episodes.name: Avery Dreams of Kissing Karl
episodes.overview: Avery becomes worried when she has a recurring dream that she and Karl are boyfriend and girlfriend. Meanwhile, Chloe wants to give up choir to become a BMX bike rider like Tyler.

episodes.name: Dog on a Catwalk
episodes.overview: Stan enters a fashion show wearing one of Avery's designs. Meanwhile, Tyler takes an unforeseen trip.

episodes.name: Guess Who's a Cheater?
episodes.overview: Avery, and her best friends, Max and Lindsay, all discover they're dating the same guy. Meanwhile, Tyler is accused of cheating and must prove his innocence.

episodes.name: Stan's New BFF
episodes.overview: Avery becomes jealous when Stan spends the night at Karl's house. Meanwhile, Bennett gets Chloe hooked on wrestling.

episodes.name: Stan Sleep Talks
episodes.overview: The kids turn to Bennett for psychological advice when Stan starts talking in his sleep.

episodes.name: Stan Gets Married
episodes.overview: To help fund Stan's nuptials, the family submits the wedding to the "Wackie Jackie" show, a program in which wealthy teen spends money to amuse herself.

episodes.name: Guess Who Becomes President
episodes.overview: Avery is the only one running for President; she convinces Max to run against her so that she has some competition.

episodes.name: Stan Has Puppies (1)
episodes.overview: Princess is pregnant with puppies; Stan is both nervous and thrilled about becoming a dad.

episodes.name: Stan has Puppies (2)
episodes.overview: Tyler, Avery and Chloe decide to keep the puppies.

episodes.name: You're Not My Sister Anymore
episodes.overview: Avery and Chloe get into a fight after Chloe discovers that Avery is using her to get closer to a boy she likes.

episodes.name: The Puppies Talk
episodes.overview: Avery, Tyler and Chloe discover that Gracie and Freddy can talk, just like their dad Stan.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Dating Karl
episodes.overview: Max starts to date Karl, but when they break up, Avery and Lindsay try to get them back together.

episodes.name: Murder of the Ornamental Dress
episodes.overview: When Avery’s latest design gets ruined before a big fashion show, she must get to the bottom of who destroyed the dress.

episodes.name: Stan Rescues His Princess
episodes.overview: When Heather and Princess will be gone at a special school for a month, Stan keeps taking Princess away so he will keep his family together.

episodes.name: Cat with a Blog
episodes.overview: After accidentally ruining Ellen’s new couch, Stan wishes he’d never been a part of the family and wonders what it would have been like if he had been a cat instead.

episodes.name: Avery Starts Driving
episodes.overview: After running over a neighbor's lawn gnome, Avery asks Tyler to help her prep for her driving test. Meanwhile, Chloe's afraid that getting older will jeopardize her title as "the cute one."

episodes.name: Stan's Secret Is Out
episodes.overview: Ellen and Bennett find out that Stan can talk, and shortly after the entire James-Jennings family is taken hostage by the U.S. Space Command's Alien Division. Together, the Jennings-James family must work together and devise an escape plan, all while protecting Stan.
